article.title: SIGNAL Says: Mark Orndorff
article.author: Katie Packard
article.abstract: "The difference there is that we don't want to prioritize and think just in terms of 'how do we secure information' without thinking through our real objective of assuring support for DOD missions."--Mark Orndorff, director of the PEO for Mission Assurance and Network Operations, DISA
article.text:
"The difference there is [that] we don't want to prioritize and think just in terms of 'how do we secure information' without thinking through our real objective of assuring support for DOD missions."--Mark Orndorff, director of the PEO for Mission Assurance and Network Operations, DISA
Find out what Orndorff is talking about by reading the full article, available on SIGNAL Online.
